definition: an utterance (of words) with spitting sounds (as in rage), spit up in an explosive manner
details:
noun
- an utterance (of words) with spitting sounds (as in rage)
= synonyms: splutter
- the noise of something spattering or sputtering explosively
= synonyms: spatter
verb
- spit up in an explosive manner
= synonyms: splutter, spit out
- cause to undergo a process in which atoms are removed
= example: cause to undergo a process in which atoms are removed
- utter with a spitting sound, as if in a rage
= synonyms: splutter
- climb awkwardly, as if by scrambling
= synonyms: clamber
- make an explosive sound
= example: make an explosive sound
